name: topically
content:
topically adverb
(HAPPENING NOW)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is of interest at the present time, or that relates to things that are happening at present: I think he was struggling to be topically relevant. The book is so topically relevant to our daily lives.
More examplesFewer examplesThe band has a new generation of topically relevant songs.The book is sometimes riveting and couldn't be more topically immediate.

topically adverb
(BY SUBJECT)
in a way that relates to a particular subject: This archive consists of a topically organized selection of articles. Links from topically related pages will be beneficial to your website.
More examplesFewer examplesThe material is arranged topically.This biography is organized topically rather than chronologically.This is quite different topically from most of his previous books.
